text: Col. (retd.) Shawkat Ali MP (; 27 January 1937 â€“ 16 November 2020) was a Bangladeshi politician. He was deputy speaker of the National Parliament from 2009 to 2014. He was a member of the Awami League. He was a member of parliament from 1979 to 1986 and again from 1991 to 2014. Ali was born in Shariatpur District, Bangladesh. Ali died on 16 November 2020 at the age of 83. ==References== Category:1937 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Politicians from Dhaka Division Category:5th Jatiya Sangsad members Category:7th Jatiya Sangsad members Category:8th Jatiya Sangsad members Category:9th Jatiya Sangsad members Category:10th Jatiya Sangsad members
title: Shawkat Ali (politician)
